content:
* Mode of color presentation was manipulated in two conditions: color combined with target shape or color shown separately on a ring.
* Color match was manipulated in three conditions: target-match, distractor-match, and no-match.
* Each mode of color presentation had 96 trials in no-match condition, and 48 trials each in target- and distractor-match conditions.
* Participants went through 384 trials in total.
* 15.8% of trials were removed due to errors such as anticipations, late trials, imprecise initial fixations, delayed initial fixations, and amplitude errors. Error percentages were recorded and presented in Table
